https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.name: ensemble
https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.description: An app for Firefox OS that lets you share a number of musical toys that can run in your friends' devices, served from your phone, either by typing in the IP address of the phone server, or by bumping NFC devices together.
https://callahad.github.io/disconnected-.author: soledad penadés

https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.name: IRCCloud Notifier
https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.description: Allows you to log into IRCCloud and get alerts on new notifications. Not a full IRC client.
https://mikehenrty.github.io/IRCCloudNot.author: Nathaniel van Diepen

https://fxos.github.io/dialer/dist/app/m.name: New Dialer
